  • Method Details

    • validCoord

      public static boolean validCoord​(Coord c)
      Check if a coordinate is valid for the game. More formally, this method returns true if and only if both values of the coordinate are between 0 (included) and Board.BOARD_SIZE (excluded)
      Parameters:
      c - coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

    • isNear

      public boolean isNear​(Coord c) throws InvalidCoordinatesException
      Check if this coordinates are near to the given coordinates (1 step horizontally, vertically or both)
      Parameters:
      c - the other given coordinates
      Returns:
      true if near, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidCoordinatesException - when this or the given coordinates are not valid

    • sum

      public Coord sum​(Coord c)
      Sum the components of the given coordinates to this
      Parameters:
      c - the coordinates to sum
      Returns:
      new coordinates which are the sum

    • convertStringToCoord

      public static Coord convertStringToCoord​(java.lang.String input) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Convert a string (like A1, B2...) to a Coord object
      Parameters:
      input - the string to convert
      Returns:
      a Coord object equivalent
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when bad input
